00025 /*! \file
00026   \brief OCS serial port implementation with WISHBONE slave interface. [functionality not implemented]
00027  */
00028 
00029 /*! \brief \copybrief ocs_serial.v
00030 
00031 List of serial registers:
00032 \verbatim
00033 Not implemented:
00034     SERDATR     *018  R   P       Serial port data and status read              read implemented here
00035      [DSKBYTR   *01A  R   P       Disk data byte and status read                read implemented here]
00036 
00037     SERDAT      *030  W   P       Serial port data and stop bits write
00038     SERPER      *032  W   P       Serial port period and control
00039 \endverbatim
00040 */
00041 
00042 module ocs_serial(
00043     //% \name Clock and reset

00044     //% @{
00045     input CLK_I,
00046     input reset_n,
00047     //% @}
00048     
00049     //% \name WISHBONE slave

00050     //% @{
00051     input CYC_I,
00052     input STB_I,
00053     input WE_I,
00054     input [8:2] ADR_I,
00055     input [3:0] SEL_I,
00056     input [31:0] DAT_I,
00057     output reg [31:0] DAT_O,
00058     output reg ACK_O,
00059     //% @}
00060     
00061     //% \name Not aligned register access on a 32-bit WISHBONE bus

00062     //% @{
00063         // DSKBYTR read implemented here
00064     output na_dskbytr_read,
00065     input [15:0] na_dskbytr
00066     //% @}
00067 );
00068 
00069 assign na_dskbytr_read =
00070     (CYC_I == 1'b1 && STB_I == 1'b1 && WE_I == 1'b0 && { ADR_I, 2'b0 } == 9'h018 && SEL_I[1:0] != 2'b00 && ACK_O == 1'b0);
00071 
00072 always @(posedge CLK_I or negedge reset_n) begin
00073     if(reset_n == 1'b0) begin
00074         DAT_O <= 32'd0;
00075         ACK_O <= 1'b0;
00076     end
00077     else begin
00078         if(CYC_I == 1'b1 && STB_I == 1'b1 && ACK_O == 1'b0) ACK_O <= 1'b1;
00079         else ACK_O <= 1'b0;
00080         
00081         if(CYC_I == 1'b1 && STB_I == 1'b1 && WE_I == 1'b0) begin
00082             if({ ADR_I, 2'b0 } == 9'h018 && SEL_I[0] == 1'b1)  DAT_O[7:0]     <= na_dskbytr[7:0];
00083             if({ ADR_I, 2'b0 } == 9'h018 && SEL_I[1] == 1'b1)  DAT_O[15:8]    <= na_dskbytr[15:8];
00084             if({ ADR_I, 2'b0 } == 9'h018 && SEL_I[2] == 1'b1)  DAT_O[23:16]   <= 8'd0;
00085             if({ ADR_I, 2'b0 } == 9'h018 && SEL_I[3] == 1'b1)  DAT_O[31:24]   <= 8'd0;
00086         end
00087     end
00088 end
00089 
00090 endmodule
